text: Solothurn (, , , ) is a district and the capital of the Swiss canton of Solothurn. As of December 2016, 16,697 people lived there. It is the only municipality of the district of the same name. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the city of Solothurn * Solothurn tourist office D/F + Category:Municipalities of the canton of Solothurn Category:Districts of Solothurn Category:Capital cities in Switzerland Category:Imperial free cities
title: Solothurn (city)
